entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -37.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 2:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -37.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa steady
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -41.4°C
Wind: SE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 53 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
